languages.text: "Две нити связал долг. Такие узы крепче любых чувств, что восхваляют миряне".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Abelard: "So, ahem, the marriage of Lady Cassia and the Lord Captain... A worthy union between the heads of two great dynasties."

languages.text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
languages.original_text: "Две нити связал долг. Такие узы крепче любых чувств, что восхваляют миряне".

traits.locale_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
"Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
"Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
"Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
"Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

languages.text: "Zwei Fäden, die durch Pflicht miteinander verbunden sind. Eine solche Bindung ist stärker als alles, was die Laienschaft so preist."
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

traits.locale_text: "Zwei Fäden, die durch Pflicht miteinander verbunden sind. Eine solche Bindung ist stärker als alles, was die Laienschaft so preist."

languages.text: « Deux fils liés ensemble par le devoir. De tels liens sont plus forts que tous les sentiments dont les profanes nous rebattent les oreilles. »
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

traits.locale_text: « Deux fils liés ensemble par le devoir. De tels liens sont plus forts que tous les sentiments dont les profanes nous rebattent les oreilles. »

languages.text: «Dos hilos atados por el deber. Un vínculo más fuerte que ningún sentimiento que los laicos alaban».
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

traits.locale_text: «Dos hilos atados por el deber. Un vínculo más fuerte que ningún sentimiento que los laicos alaban».

languages.text: 「義務により、二つの糸が結ばれている。そのような絆は、信徒が称賛するどんな感情よりも強い」
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

traits.locale_text: 「義務により、二つの糸が結ばれている。そのような絆は、信徒が称賛するどんな感情よりも強い」

languages.text: “两条丝线，被责任捆绑在一起。这样的纽带，比普通人所赞颂的任何感情都要更加牢固。”
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

traits.locale_text: “两条丝线，被责任捆绑在一起。这样的纽带，比普通人所赞颂的任何感情都要更加牢固。”

languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."

languages.text: "İki iplik, vazifeyle birbirine bağlantı. Böylesi bağlar, başka uğraşlardakilerin göklere çıkardığı her türlü histen daha kuvvetlidir."
languages.original_text: "Two threads tied together by duty. Such bonds are stronger than any sentiment the laity extol."
